name: ЯАДIAL ( Radial )
description:
This is our first team endeavour, Unfortunately we ran out of time and the game is not in a enjoyable state :)  Thanks for understanding.

In ЯАДIAL you  play as a Russian inspired robot and are tasked with exterminating all mutants and threats in an old nuclear facility.

Controlls

Left Click - Move to the mouse cursor
Right Click - Dash to the mouse cursor
